thread.title: BRIEF-Abeona Announces FDA Grants Rmat Designation To ABO-102 Gene Therapy In MPS Iiia

title: BRIEF-Abeona Announces FDA Grants Rmat Designation To ABO-102 Gene Therapy In MPS Iiia
text:
17 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Abeona Announces FDA Grants Rmat Designation To ABO-102 Gene Therapy In MPS Iiia Reuters Staff 
April 23 (Reuters) - Abeona Therapeutics Inc: 
* ABEONA ANNOUNCES FDA GRANTS RMAT DESIGNATION TO ABO-102 GENE THERAPY IN MPS IIIA 
* ABEONA THERAPEUTICS INC - COMPANY CONTINUES TO ENGAGE FDA ON ITS ONGOING PHASE 1/2 TRIAL 
* ABEONA - FDA GRANTED REGENERATIVE MEDICINE ADVANCED THERAPY DESIGNATION TO ABO-102, COâ€™S GENE THERAPY FOR TREATMENT OF SANFILIPPO SYNDROME TYPE A Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
